amendment.description: Amendment adds the Administrator of Animal and Plant Health Inspection Service to the First Responder Grants Board.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 109-77 to add the Administrator of Animal and Plant Health Inspection Service to the First Responder Grants Board.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Berry amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Berry.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Berry amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
